TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(object sender, DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: 表示将用来处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). [NIB： 事件和委托NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115) > [!NOTE] > 如果服务器不会发送下载的文件 （如被动 FTP 连接的情况下），大小可以始终为零。If the server does not send the size of the downloaded file (such as in the case of a passive FTP connection), may always be zero. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for the event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#19)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#19)]
